required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Electrophysiology in Congenital Cataract After Lensectomy and Anterior
clinical_study.official_title: The Change of Electrophysiology in Congenital Cataract After Lensectomy and Anterior Vitrectomy

brief_summary.textblock: In this prospective study , a cohort of 91 eyes with congenital cataract and 25 eyes normal eyes from Wenzhou medical university was erolled.91 eyes with congenital cataract was after lensectomy and anterior vitrectomy as test group, 25 normal eyes as control group. The a- and b-wave and PhNR related parameters was evaluated.

detailed_description.textblock:
Secondary IOL implantation in aphika children and lensectomy and anterior vitrectomy and primary IOL implantation in children with congenital cataract were both performed by the same surgeon(Z.Y.E).
electroretinography and photopic negative response are performed to each patient.The research was to evaluate the relationship between the best corrected visionn and the related parameters of a- and b-wave and PhNR .

primary_outcome.time_frame: at least 1year after the surgery of congenital cataract
primary_outcome.description: investigate retinal function changes of congenital cataract children. ERG related parameters including a- and b-wave and PhNR amplitude and latency.

arm_group.description: children with congenital cataract who underwent lensectomy and anterior vitrectomy and IOL implantation are perfomed ERG
age-matched normal children are perfomed ERG

study_pop.textblock: congenital cataract age from 1.5 years to 15 years who underwent cataract surgery at least 1 year

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- phakic children diagnosed with congenital cataract who underwent secondary IOL implantation and children with congenital cataract who underwent lensectomy and anterior vitrectomy and primary IOL implantation
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients with mild cataracts do not require surgery

facility.name: Eye Hosptial of Wenzhou Medical College
